amendment.description: An amendment to increase Energy Programs, Department of Energy by $9,000,000 and reduce Departmental Administration, Department of Energy by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: Amendment allocates an additional $9 million to the Department of Energy's Water Power Program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bonamici amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Bonamici amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A015) offered by Ms. Bonamici.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
